Welcome to McKinnon's

McKinnon provides experienced, reliable and cost effective earthworks and environmental contracting services to industry. We are experts in Underground Storage Tank (UST) removal, demolition, environmental earthworks and groundwater and vapour remediation.

At McKinnon, we have an extensive range of remediation, wastewater treatment and earthworks equipment available for hire. We offer trained, competent and qualified technical and professional personnel to achieve your project goals.

We have over 25 years in operation and robust Work Health and Safety (WHS) and Quality management systems in place.

Give McKinnon a call to discuss your project requirements, obtain advice on practical solutions and obtain fee estimates.

Awards and Accreditations

McKinnon

McKinnon Earthmoving (QLD) Pty Ltd / McKinnon Environmental Pty Ltd (McKinnon) has grown and led the way in providing innovative and comprehensive earthmoving and environmental contracting services sincee 1991.
